const handleDateChange=date=>setSelectedDate(date);const handleTimeChange=selectedOption=>setSelectedTime(selectedOption.value);const handleInputChange=e=>setPostDetails({...postDetails,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});const handleImageChange=e=>setPostDetails({...postDetails,image:e.target.files[0]});const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const dateTime=moment(selectedDate).set({hour:moment(selectedTime,'HH:mm').hour(),minute:moment(selectedTime,'HH:mm').minute()}).toDate();//debug log

Date(post.scheduledTime)}));setEvents(fetchedEvents);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching scheduled posts:',error);}};fetchScheduledPosts();},[]);const
